name: Magna-Puzzle
description:
WARNING: I URGE you not to just play the game now before rating. This is currently a WIP and by the time the submissions are due, this game will expand and become very different. So, either wait to play it later or play it again before you vote because it will change very much. Thank you!

this is a work in progress

use arrow keys to move and slash to switch polarity

there is a secret
